name: Spectrum (itch) (theblackfractal)
description:
Spectrum is an in-development twin-stick shooter, with color based gameplay and added third dimension for movement.

Destroy enemies by matching the color of your laser to the color of the enemy.

More intended to be a proof of concept than a full fledged release.

Janky,  poorly optimized, and early, but try it out.

Bug Note: Game will freeze when you die lol

Keyboard + Mouse Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Fly

Center Click - Bomb

Left Shift - Boost

Space - Cycle Color

Gamepad Controls:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Fire

R2  - Fly

L2 - Boost

R1 - Cycle Color

L1 -  Bomb
